text: Ware ga kuruān o gaikoku-go de kudashitanaraba, kare-ra wa kitto,`kono shirushi wa, dōshite hakkiri nobe rarenai nodeshou. Nanto, Arabia hito (no shito) ni gaikoku-go (no keiji)na nodesu ka.' To iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Sore wa shinkō suru mono ni totte wa michibikideari, chiryōdearu.Daga shinjinai mono wa, sono mimi ga nibuku nari, mata sore ga (wakarazu) mōmokudearu. Kare-ra wa, tōi tokoro kara yobikake rareru (yōna mo) nodearu
